title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
### Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags

**Product Highlights:**
- **Count:** 50 bags per pack
- **Capacity:** 13 gallons
- **Scent:** Unscented
- **Material:** Tear-resistant white plastic
- **Strength:** Flex-tra strength
- **Closure Type:** Red drawstring
- **Alexa Voice Shopping:** Compatible

**Product Description:**

Upgrade your kitchen waste management with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. This pack of 50 bags offers a generous 13-gallon capacity, making them ideal for everyday use in busy kitchens. Each bag is made from high-quality, tear-resistant white plastic, ensuring durability and reliability even when handling heavy or sharp waste.

The Flex-tra strength design provides extra resistance against tearing and punctures, giving you peace of mind that your trash will stay securely contained. The red drawstring closure not only adds a touch of color to your kitchen but also ensures a tight seal, preventing any leaks or spills.

These unscented bags are perfect for those who prefer a neutral, clean-smelling environment. Plus, with Alexa voice shopping compatibility, you can easily reorder more bags with just a voice command, ensuring you never run out when you need them most.

**Key Features:**
- **Durable and Reliable:** Made from tear-resistant white plastic with Flex-tra strength.
- **Convenient Closure:** Red drawstring for a secure and easy-to-tie seal.
- **Generous Capacity:** 13 gallons to handle all your kitchen waste.
- **Unscented:** Keeps your kitchen smelling fresh and clean.
- **Voice Shopping:** Compatible with Alexa for easy reordering.

**Ideal For:**
- Busy households
- Commercial kitchens
- Anyone looking for reliable and durable trash bags

**Customer Satisfaction:**
Amazon Basics is committed to providing high-quality products at great value. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, we offer a hassle-free return policy.

Add the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags to your kitchen essentials today and experience superior performance and convenience!
